rules.name: ABM_Campaign_Target_Expansion_Swag_Request
rules.label: ABM Campaign - Target Expansion Swag Request

Flow.description: Updating Gifting Campaign records for 2025 Q2
Flow.label: Opportunity - Customer Marketing Button

loops.name: Add_Account_Contacts_to_Selected_Opp
loops.label: Add Account Contacts to Selected Opp

fields.name: ABMExpansionSwagHeader
fields.fieldText:
Expansion Swag Kits

This campaign enables Customer Marketing's partner, Sendoso, to confirm any selected customer's mailing address before sending a kit.


There are two types of kits; a Tier 1 Kit for BUYERS, and a Tier 2 Kit for CHAMPIONS (see photo example)


Strategic AEs can request up to 5 kits per opportunity.

Enterprise AEs can request up to 3 kits per opportunity.


﻿

fields.name: CABNominationHeader
fields.fieldText:
Customer Advisory Board Nomination

CAB members will have an exclusive opportunity to help shape Retool's roadmap in this year-long, invite-only program (quarterly cadence of in-person and virtual engagements).


Who should be nominated: C-level, VP, SrDir at STRAT/ENT accounts; individuals in Eng/IT/Architecture/Data, etc (at large enterprises, Dir+ titles will be considered).

fields.name: Do_you_need_to_add_additional_people_at_the_account_who_weren_t_on_the_Opportuni
fields.fieldText: Do you need to add additional people at the account who weren't on the Opportunity?

fields.name: CABConfirmationText
fields.fieldText:
Thanks for submitting your reference request(s)!


Customer Marketing will let you know when your nomination has been reviewed (give it 2-3 weeks for next steps).

fields.name: CABNominationDescription
fields.fieldText: Please fill out or modify the following information to the best of your knowledge.

fields.name: Buyer_vs_builder
fields.fieldText:
Which of these best describes your nominee:

  1. Buyer (Senior Decision-Maker = IDEAL)
  2. Champion (Highly strategic/engaged lead with influence over the purchase decision)

fields.name: Description
fields.fieldText: Why are you nominating this person?
fields.helpText: Describe how they'd show up as an engaged and active CAB member

fields.name: What_is_the_customers_Use_Case
fields.fieldText: What is the customers Use Case?
fields.helpText: Please share more info on the account's usage of Retool (which use cases/for what purposes)

fields.name: CAB_Geo
fields.fieldText: Lastly, where is this person located?

fields.name: ConfirmationText
fields.fieldText:
Thanks for submitting your reference request(s)!


Customer Marketing will let you know when this gift is expected to ship (give it 1-2 weeks). Here’s the pre-printed notecard greeting your recipient will receive with this gift.

screens.name: Select_which_other_people_you_would_like_to_add
screens.label: Select which other people you would like to add

fields.name: WhichOtherPeople
fields.fieldText: Select which other people you would like to add

fields.name: UhOh
fields.fieldText:
Uh Oh!

Looks like something unexpected happened in the system - please reach out to Elise in #revops-systems-general with a bit of context of what you were trying to do and we'll get it sorted!

screens.name: What_sort_of_Customer_Marketing_request_are_you_submitting
screens.label: What sort of Customer Marketing request are you submitting?

fields.name: ExistingRequestText
fields.fieldText: Here is a list of all Customer Reference requests already submitted from this Opportunity; please review to ensure you are not submitting duplicate requests.

fields.name: WhatKindOfRequest
fields.fieldText:
What kind of Customer Reference would you like to submit?

This list will evolve as more Customer Reference activities are stood up in the systems. If something is missing that you expected, please reach out in #revops-systems-general

fields.name: WhatTypeOfKit
fields.fieldText:
Which of your selected contacts would you like to get the Tier 1: Exec Buyer / Decision Maker kit?


Those not selected will get the Tier 2: Champion / Builder kit.

fields.name: Not_currently_a_customer
fields.fieldText: The opportunity you have selected is for an account that is not yet a customer. Please close this window or return to the previous step and select a different Customer Reference option.

textTemplates.name: CABDescription
textTemplates.text:
Nomination Description: {!Description}


Customer Use Case: {!What_is_the_customers_Use_Case}

Contact Geo: {!CAB_Geo}

Account Renewal Date: {!For_Each_Selected_Contact.Account.Next_Renewal_Date__c}
